member.name: T:Swagger_Demo.App_Start.SwaggerConfig
member.summary: Configures Swagger (OpenAPI) generation and the Swagger UI for Web API.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.App_Start.SwaggerConfig.Register(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Registers Swagger generator and UI. Call from Application_Start.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.App_Start.SwaggerConfig.GetXmlCommentsPath
member.summary: Returns the XML comments file path for this assembly.
member.returns: Full path to XML documentation file emitted by compiler.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.WebApiConfig.Register(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Register routing and other Web API configuration.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.Controllers.ValuesController.Get
member.summary: GET api/values Returns a small list of values.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.Controllers.ValuesController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: GET api/values/{id} Returns the requested value by id.

member.name: T:Swagger_Demo.Filters.AddAuthHeaderParameter
member.summary: Adds the Authorization header parameter to each operation in the generated Swagger doc. This makes it possible to enter a Bearer token in the UI for testing protected endpoints.

member.name: M:Swagger_Demo.Filters.AddAuthHeaderParameter.Apply(Swashbuckle.Swagger.Operation,Swashbuckle.Swagger.SchemaRegistry,System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Applies the filter to an operation.
